toomanybatmans
This is [B]a[/B] Punisher, not [I]the[/I] Punisher. They are robots that work in Galactus' Taa 2 ship and defend it against attack. If you have ever played the good version of Marvel : Ultimate Alliance (eg PlayStation 2) you are probably familiar with them).
